projects.title: Semaphore Projects Ids
projects.description: Comma separated list of project ids. If not set, all data will be pulled from all projects. Project ids can be retrieved using the api under '/api/v1alpha/projects'.

branch.title: VCS Branch Name
branch.description: Comma separated list of branch names to filter the dataset. If not set, all data will be pulled from all branches.

timeout.title: HTTP Client Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout (in sec) for the HTTP client used to make the api calls. Use this to mitigate Semaphore Api performance

delay.title: Delay to be added in between API requests
delay.description: Delay (in ms) to force the source to sleep in between api calls. This can be used to control the rate of api requests - (0 means there's no delay)
